main.name: feetdraggerdoctor
main.description: This was our 6th or 7th stay and the staff is still very accommodating. The location is strategic being right beside convenience stores, mall, and restaurants. I can say we plan to make it a habit to greet the new year here.

attributes.value: This was our 6th or 7th stay and the staff is still very accommodating. The location is strategic being right beside convenience stores, mall, and restaurants. I can say we plan to make it a habit to greet the new year here.

main.name: AdrianM853
main.description: The suites themselves are excellent with modern self catering facilities, fabulous bathroom, comfy beds and exceptionally clean. The location is great for the CBD and restaurant and malls are close by.

attributes.value: The suites themselves are excellent with modern self catering facilities, fabulous bathroom, comfy beds and exceptionally clean. The location is great for the CBD and restaurant and malls are close by.
